ethord 0.0.0.9000

ethord

The swissopenuniversities ORD projects metadata package

Metadata relative to each project funded by the Open Research Data (ORD) initiative by swissuniversities.

Installation

You can install the development version of ethord from GitHub with:

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("openwashdata/ethord")
